metadata.title: CVE-2013-7370 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
node-connect before 2.8.1 has XSS in the Sencha Labs Connect middleware

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-connect - 3.7.0+~3.4.35-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-connect package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.0+~3.4.35-1').
